Author: cyrelb#6993
Content: Some suggestions: 1) push or email when an order is executed / cancelled. 2) Canceled orders in the history 3) possibility to set a threshold to automatically claim KMD reward

Author: ca333#0118
Content: Thanks for the suggestions - push-notifications are certainly coming in the near future @cyrelb - 3) too - as for 2) not sure if that makes sense since cancelled orders didn't execute any swap/blockchain logic - it might also fill your history with irrelevant data.
